name: restockping-backend
description: Express backend with TypeScript and Supabase integration

scripts.db:setup: echo 'Setting up complete database...' && node scripts/setup-database.js
scripts.db:setup:conditional: echo 'Setting up database conditionally...' && node scripts/setup-database-conditional.js
scripts.db:setup:vercel: echo 'Setting up database for Vercel...' && node scripts/setup-database-vercel.js
scripts.db:seed: echo 'Seeding database with sample data...' && node scripts/seed-database-simple.js
scripts.db:test: echo 'Testing Paris Office data...' && node scripts/test-paris-data.js
scripts.team:setup: echo 'Setting up team PINs...' && node scripts/update-team-pins.js
scripts.team:update: echo 'Updating existing team PINs...' && node scripts/update-existing-pins.js
scripts.team:scan-test: echo 'Testing team scan API...' && node scripts/test-scan-api.js
scripts.team:send-test: echo 'Testing team send API...' && node scripts/test-send-api.js
